name: Mariusz Jan Skobel
profile_summary:
Senior Software Engineer with over 10 years of experience in delivering high-performance, cloud-native software solutions. Expertise in **C#**, **SaaS**, **DevOps**, **CI/CD**, **Agile** methodologies, and **Observability** using tools like **New Relic**, **Splunk**, and **GitHub Actions**. Strong background in implementing **Telemetry** systems for enhanced performance monitoring and troubleshooting. Proven ability to collaborate effectively through **Scrum** practices, ensuring quality through **Code Reviews**, **Unit Testing**, and adherence to **SOLID** principles and **OOP**. Experienced in leading technical teams and providing mentorship by offering **Technical Guidance** and **Coaching**.

Additionally, skilled in modern technologies including **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Python**, and **Flutter** with hands-on proficiency across the full stack using **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**. Demonstrated history in developing enterprise platforms that integrate AI/ML capabilities, utilizing tools like **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow** for MLOps. Committed to building secure, maintainable solutions that meet compliance standards such as HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2, all while driving real-world impact.
